column5: LOST ROD THIS MORNING BETWEEN 7:00 - 7:30am between 9th of Oro boat launch and Oro Reef. Noticed it gone when we stopped to check Navionics. It's a 32" MH Zebco Rhino with a red tip section and a Mitchell Avocet reel. If found you can call or text 705 795 8121. I can offer a handful of new style Meegs jigs as reward  Thanks, Jesse
